item.title: 2 questoins please replie
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“minymo11, post:5, topic:276487”][quote author=yong min link=topic=365121.msg2769867#msg2769867 date=1241048423]
Here is the link for the webclient: http://www.4shared.com/file/99728222/a6e0407a/easyrsc_webclient_.html

However, that was unfinished, so take a look and finish it up ^^
[/quote]
Only issue erm i dont get how to use compilers so can somone tell me how i am aspose to compile this stuff please yung ming cuase i was looking at your tut but i need to know how to compile and also can you recamend a good compiler that would be awsem it would make you awsome k please[/quote]

WTF is Yung Ming? Are you another complete imbecile who can’t read?

[quote=“minymo11, post:9, topic:276487”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=365121.msg2770220#msg2770220 date=1241060729]
the compiler comes with the client
[/quote]
Lol evrytime i use the compiler in the cilent it messses it up so it wont run so tell me why it is doing that if you are so smart :)[/quote]

Probably because you don’t know what you’re doing and you get errors after you’ve edited the java file. Read the cmd prompt and fix the errors.

[quote=“minymo11, post:1, topic:276487”][color=red]i need to know how to make poeple mods/admin[/quote]Go to EasyRSC - server - players - open the account name with notepad/wordpad and search for rank=0 rank 2 = p mod…rank 3 = mod… rank 4 = admin…
